In the end God will not destroy man. Man shall rise up to and destroy thems=
elves leaving nature to clean up our destruction.
  ----- Original Message =
----- 
  From: Roland the Last Gunslinger 
  To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  =
Sent: Wednesday, September 12, 2001 3:09 PM
  Subject: Re: Terrorist bombs-=
Everyone read


  OOC: So, what you're trying to say is that humans will ca=
use a plague unto themselves? It's possible, but perhaps for our sake it'll=
 actually happen a thousand years from now or so, if it's going to happen a=
t all...

    From: wingedwarrior41@hotma=
il.com

    Sent: Wednesday, September 12, =
2001 6:00 PM

ase war does happen... what about bio or chemical weapons? It 
    might ca=
use a plague too....
